name: Wanted Buck
description:
There is a lot of games where you play as a bounty hunter, but is there one where YOU are the ONE being HUNTED?

Wanted buck is 100% done, the game will be released in a week or so.

The year is 18XX. Buck is wanted by the bounty hunters and the police, and his goal is to escape the country to find a better place to live.

He is being chased because he robbed a bank back in his hometown.

If you die , you start from the BEGINNING.

This is the first game I finished in my life, and at least 95% of the game was made by myself. 

GENRE : Action, Platformer, Indie.
